titles.title: To eliminate the regional system of organizing the National Forest System and to replace the regional offices of the Forest Service with State offices.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forestry, Resource Conservation and Research.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 5/20/1998--Introduced. Replaces the regional system of organizing the National Forest System with a State-based system.
